reviewTimelines.activity: In‑principle approval must be received prior to providing the Placement Memorandum and term sheet to the EBP platform.
In‑principle approval must be received prior to the issue opening date.

knownBlockers.description: Placement Memorandum & term sheet must now be submitted 2 working days before issue opening (or 3 working days for first‑time EBP issuers).
Green shoe portion capped at 5× base issue size; issuers must disclose both the cap and prior‑year usage of green‑shoe options.
Allotment at the cut‑off coupon/price/spread is standardized to be done on a pro‑rata basis, with detailed illustrations provided in Annexure VI‑A.

Anchor portions now specified by credit rating: AAA/AA+/AA/AA‑ ≤30%, A+/A‑ ≤40%, Others ≤50%. Anchor confirmations must be received by T‑1 day; unconfirmed amounts are added back to the base issue size.
EBPs must update a comprehensive set of issuance details by end of T‑day (if closed by 1 PM) or by 1 PM on T+1 (otherwise).
